error: Another resource is loaded from path "res://path/to/resource" (possible cyclic resource inclusion)
aliases: Another resource is loaded from path"res://path/to/resource"
meaning: Godot detected a recurring resource loading cycle.
causes: Scenes referencing each other directly or indirectly
Autoloads preloading scenes that reference them
Resources referencing their owning scene or script
Editor tool scripts triggering loading a resource again
fixes: Replace "preload()" with "load()" to avoid eager loading cycles
Decouple scenes using signals or runtime assignment
Move shared logic into a separate common resource
Avoid hard references from scenes back to autoloads
Adjustment "@tool" scripts to not trigger editor loads
